title: Brave Kate
brief_description: A violent puppet animated treatment of a 19th century Czech song in which Kate sets out to avenge the murder of her father. Displaying trmendous courage and resourcefulness she tracks the murderes and eliminates them one by one. Animated by Vlasta Pospisilova, Xenie Maresova and Alfons Mensdorff-Pouilly.
